thread.section_title: Hotel Kapok Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Satisfied!
thread.title_full: Satisfied! - Review of Hotel Kapok Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: ging b
title: Satisfied!
text:
Location was incredible. Walking distance to the Forbidden City and huge shopping center. Rooms and service were excellent. I got a room facing the street and it was nice waking up with the view of a bustling city.
I chanced on several hawker stalls nearby and got some really mean chicken noodles.
I didn't try the hotel breakfast though as I was more interested in the various restaurants in the neighborhood that were serving up local fare.
